CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(ParallelMarket_Status__pc, "Red"), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/ParallelMarketRed.png","red",21,45),
IF( ISPICKVAL(ParallelMarket_Status__pc, "Orange"), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/ParallelMarketOrange.png","orange",23,35),
IF( ISPICKVAL(ParallelMarket_Status__pc, "Green"), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/ParallelMarketGreen.png","green",23,35),
IF( ISPICKVAL(ParallelMarket_Status__pc, "Blue"), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/ParallelMarketBlue.png","blue",23,35),
IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/ParallelMarketGrey.png","grey",23,35)))))
CustomField.label: Client flag
